name: alumni-accel
description: AlumniAccel - The Ultimate Alumni Engagement & Empowerment SaaS Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:client
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: echo 'Setting up environment files...' && cp api/.env.example api/.env && cp client/.env.example client/.env
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules api/node_modules client/node_modules api/dist client/dist

author: AlumniAccel Team
